snippet.title: VR Hero Sentry Reveal Trailer
snippet.description:
VR Hero Sentry is the forthcoming action-RPG from the team at Refocus Solutions.
Inspired by classic RTS hero mods,  gamers will shape a hero to their unique playstyle, annihilate monsters and encounter gargantuan bosses to build experience and spell points to explore personal spell paths and improve hero stats in a persistent RPG vendor system that offers player-character, troops, armoury and weapon upgrades.
